name: Harvest Moon Chicken & Veggie Mooncakes
description: Handcrafted with premium chicken and organic vegetables, these nourishing mooncakes bring delightful flavor and balanced nutrition to both cats and dogs.

name: Garden-Fresh Chicken & Veggie Biscuits
description: Baked to crisp perfection with succulent chicken and vibrant organic vegetables, these low-fat biscuits offer a wholesome, savory crunch that delights both feline and canine companions.

name: Grass-Fed Beef & Veggie Macarons
description: Combining tender, grass-fed beef with nutrient-rich greens, these airy macarons provide a gourmet treat that pets savor in every bite, ensuring pure enjoyment for cats and dogs alike.

name: Ocean-Kissed Shrimp Biscuits
description: Crisp and flavorful shrimp biscuits enriched with oceanic minerals, perfect for both cats and dogs who crave a taste of the sea.

name: GreenCrunch Veggie Dental Sticks
description: Crafted from fibrous organic vegetables, these dental sticks support oral health, helping reduce plaque and ensure happier smiles for your beloved companions.

name: Heart-Healthy Sea Fish Crispies
description: Infused with heart-supportive omega-3s from fresh sea fish, these light, crunchy crispies are a nutritious delight that pets love to nibble.
